00028 /* Texture Mapping */
00029 
00030 TextureMapping::TextureMapping()
00031 {
00032     translation = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00033     rotation = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00034     scale = make_float3(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00035 
00036     x_mapping = X;
00037     y_mapping = Y;
00038     z_mapping = Z;
00039 
00040     projection = FLAT;
00041 }
00042 
00043 Transform TextureMapping::compute_transform()
00044 {
00045     Transform mmat = transform_scale(make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f));
00046 
00047     if(x_mapping != NONE)
00048         mmat[0][x_mapping-1] = 1.0f;
00049     if(y_mapping != NONE)
00050         mmat[1][y_mapping-1] = 1.0f;
00051     if(z_mapping != NONE)
00052         mmat[2][z_mapping-1] = 1.0f;
00053 
00054     Transform smat = transform_scale(scale);
00055     Transform rmat = transform_euler(rotation);
00056     Transform tmat = transform_translate(translation);
00057 
00058     return tmat*rmat*smat*mmat;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool TextureMapping::skip()
00062 {
00063     if(translation != make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f))
00064         return false;
00065     if(rotation != make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f))
00066         return false;
00067     if(scale != make_float3(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f))
00068         return false;
00069     
00070     if(x_mapping != X || y_mapping != Y || z_mapping != Z)
00071         return false;
00072     
00073     return true;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void TextureMapping::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler, int offset_in, int offset_out)
00077 {
00078     if(offset_in == SVM_STACK_INVALID || offset_out == SVM_STACK_INVALID)
00079         return;
00080 
00081     compiler.add_node(NODE_MAPPING, offset_in, offset_out);
00082 
00083     Transform tfm = compute_transform();
00084     compiler.add_node(tfm.x);
00085     compiler.add_node(tfm.y);
00086     compiler.add_node(tfm.z);
00087     compiler.add_node(tfm.w);
00088 }

00099     return enm;

00102 ShaderEnum ImageTextureNode::color_space_enum = color_space_init();

00104 ImageTextureNode::ImageTextureNode()
00105 : TextureNode("image_texture")
00106 {
00107     image_manager = NULL;
00108     slot = -1;
00109     is_float = false;
00110     filename = "";
00111     color_space = ustring("Color");
00112 
00113     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT, ShaderInput::TEXTURE_UV);
00114     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00115     add_output("Alpha", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00116 }
00117 
00118 ImageTextureNode::~ImageTextureNode()
00119 {
00120     if(image_manager)
00121         image_manager->remove_image(filename);
00122 }
00123 
00124 ShaderNode *ImageTextureNode::clone() const
00125 {
00126     ImageTextureNode *node = new ImageTextureNode(*this);
00127     node->image_manager = NULL;
00128     node->slot = -1;
00129     node->is_float = false;
00130     return node;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void ImageTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00134 {
00135     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00136     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00137     ShaderOutput *alpha_out = output("Alpha");
00138 
00139     image_manager = compiler.image_manager;
00140     if(slot == -1)
00141         slot = image_manager->add_image(filename, is_float);
00142 
00143     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00144         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00145     if(!alpha_out->links.empty())
00146         compiler.stack_assign(alpha_out);
00147 
00148     if(slot != -1) {
00149         compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00150 
00151         int srgb = (is_float || color_space != "Color")? 0: 1;
00152         int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00153 
00154         if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00155             vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00156             tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00157         }
00158 
00159         compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_IMAGE,
00160             slot,
00161             compiler.encode_uchar4(
00162                 vector_offset,
00163                 color_out->stack_offset,
00164                 alpha_out->stack_offset,
00165                 srgb));
00166     
00167         if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00168             compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00169     }
00170     else {
00171         /* image not found */
00172         if(!color_out->links.empty()) {
00173             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, color_out->stack_offset);
00174             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, make_float3(0, 0, 0));
00175         }
00176         if(!alpha_out->links.empty())
00177             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_F, __float_as_int(0.0f), alpha_out->stack_offset);
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void ImageTextureNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00182 {
00183     compiler.parameter("filename", filename.c_str());
00184     if(is_float || color_space != "Color")
00185         compiler.parameter("color_space", "Linear");
00186     else
00187         compiler.parameter("color_space", "sRGB");
00188     compiler.add(this, "node_image_texture");
00189 }

00236 void EnvironmentTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00237 {
00238     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00239     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00240     ShaderOutput *alpha_out = output("Alpha");
00241 
00242     image_manager = compiler.image_manager;
00243     if(slot == -1)
00244         slot = image_manager->add_image(filename, is_float);
00245 
00246     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00247         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00248     if(!alpha_out->links.empty())
00249         compiler.stack_assign(alpha_out);
00250     
00251     if(slot != -1) {
00252         compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00253 
00254         int srgb = (is_float || color_space != "Color")? 0: 1;
00255         int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00256 
00257         if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00258             vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00259             tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00260         }
00261 
00262         compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_ENVIRONMENT,
00263             slot,
00264             compiler.encode_uchar4(
00265                 vector_offset,
00266                 color_out->stack_offset,
00267                 alpha_out->stack_offset,
00268                 srgb),
00269             projection_enum[projection]);
00270     
00271         if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00272             compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00273     }
00274     else {
00275         /* image not found */
00276         if(!color_out->links.empty()) {
00277             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, color_out->stack_offset);
00278             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, make_float3(0, 0, 0));
00279         }
00280         if(!alpha_out->links.empty())
00281             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_F, __float_as_int(0.0f), alpha_out->stack_offset);
00282     }
00283 }

00295 /* Sky Texture */
00296 
00297 static float2 sky_spherical_coordinates(float3 dir)
00298 {
00299     return make_float2(acosf(dir.z), atan2f(dir.x, dir.y));
00300 }
00301 
00302 static float sky_perez_function(float lam[6], float theta, float gamma)
00303 {
00304     return (1.f + lam[0]*expf(lam[1]/cosf(theta))) * (1.f + lam[2]*expf(lam[3]*gamma)  + lam[4]*cosf(gamma)*cosf(gamma));
00305 }
00306 
00307 static void sky_texture_precompute(KernelSunSky *ksunsky, float3 dir, float turbidity)
00308 {
00309     float2 spherical = sky_spherical_coordinates(dir);
00310     float theta = spherical.x;
00311     float phi = spherical.y;
00312 
00313     ksunsky->theta = theta;
00314     ksunsky->phi = phi;
00315 
00316     float theta2 = theta*theta;
00317     float theta3 = theta*theta*theta;
00318     float T = turbidity;
00319     float T2 = T * T;
00320 
00321     float chi = (4.0f / 9.0f - T / 120.0f) * (M_PI_F - 2.0f * theta);
00322     ksunsky->zenith_Y = (4.0453f * T - 4.9710f) * tan(chi) - 0.2155f * T + 2.4192f;
00323     ksunsky->zenith_Y *= 0.06f;
00324 
00325     ksunsky->zenith_x =
00326     (0.00166f * theta3 - 0.00375f * theta2 + 0.00209f * theta) * T2 +
00327     (-0.02903f * theta3 + 0.06377f * theta2 - 0.03202f * theta + 0.00394f) * T +
00328     (0.11693f * theta3 - 0.21196f * theta2 + 0.06052f * theta + 0.25886f);
00329 
00330     ksunsky->zenith_y =
00331     (0.00275f * theta3 - 0.00610f * theta2 + 0.00317f * theta) * T2 +
00332     (-0.04214f * theta3 + 0.08970f * theta2 - 0.04153f * theta  + 0.00516f) * T +
00333     (0.15346f * theta3 - 0.26756f * theta2 + 0.06670f * theta  + 0.26688f);
00334 
00335     ksunsky->perez_Y[0] = (0.1787f * T  - 1.4630f);
00336     ksunsky->perez_Y[1] = (-0.3554f * T  + 0.4275f);
00337     ksunsky->perez_Y[2] = (-0.0227f * T  + 5.3251f);
00338     ksunsky->perez_Y[3] = (0.1206f * T  - 2.5771f);
00339     ksunsky->perez_Y[4] = (-0.0670f * T  + 0.3703f);
00340 
00341     ksunsky->perez_x[0] = (-0.0193f * T  - 0.2592f);
00342     ksunsky->perez_x[1] = (-0.0665f * T  + 0.0008f);
00343     ksunsky->perez_x[2] = (-0.0004f * T  + 0.2125f);
00344     ksunsky->perez_x[3] = (-0.0641f * T  - 0.8989f);
00345     ksunsky->perez_x[4] = (-0.0033f * T  + 0.0452f);
00346 
00347     ksunsky->perez_y[0] = (-0.0167f * T  - 0.2608f);
00348     ksunsky->perez_y[1] = (-0.0950f * T  + 0.0092f);
00349     ksunsky->perez_y[2] = (-0.0079f * T  + 0.2102f);
00350     ksunsky->perez_y[3] = (-0.0441f * T  - 1.6537f);
00351     ksunsky->perez_y[4] = (-0.0109f * T  + 0.0529f);
00352 
00353     ksunsky->zenith_Y /= sky_perez_function(ksunsky->perez_Y, 0, theta);
00354     ksunsky->zenith_x /= sky_perez_function(ksunsky->perez_x, 0, theta);
00355     ksunsky->zenith_y /= sky_perez_function(ksunsky->perez_y, 0, theta);
00356 }
00357 
00358 SkyTextureNode::SkyTextureNode()
00359 : TextureNode("sky_texture")
00360 {
00361     sun_direction = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00362     turbidity = 2.2f;
00363 
00364     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR, ShaderInput::POSITION);
00365     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00366 }
00367 
00368 void SkyTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00369 {
00370     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00371     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00372 
00373     if(compiler.sunsky) {
00374         sky_texture_precompute(compiler.sunsky, sun_direction, turbidity);
00375         compiler.sunsky = NULL;
00376     }
00377 
00378     if(vector_in->link)
00379         compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00380 
00381     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00382 
00383     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00384         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00385         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00386     }
00387 
00388     compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00389     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_SKY, vector_offset, color_out->stack_offset);
00390 
00391     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00392         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00393 }
00394 
00395 void SkyTextureNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00396 {
00397     compiler.parameter_vector("sun_direction", sun_direction);
00398     compiler.parameter("turbidity", turbidity);
00399     compiler.add(this, "node_sky_texture");
00400 }

00404 static ShaderEnum gradient_type_init()
00405 {
00406     ShaderEnum enm;
00407 
00408     enm.insert("Linear", NODE_BLEND_LINEAR);
00409     enm.insert("Quadratic", NODE_BLEND_QUADRATIC);

00411     enm.insert("Diagonal", NODE_BLEND_DIAGONAL);

00413     enm.insert("Quadratic Sphere", NODE_BLEND_QUADRATIC_SPHERE);

00431 void GradientTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00432 {
00433     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00434     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00435     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00436 
00437     if(vector_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00438 
00439     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00440 
00441     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00442         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00443         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00444     }
00445 
00446     if(!fac_out->links.empty())
00447         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00448     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00449         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00450 
00451     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_GRADIENT,
00452         compiler.encode_uchar4(type_enum[type], vector_offset, fac_out->stack_offset, color_out->stack_offset));
00453 
00454     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00455         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00456 }

00460     compiler.parameter("Type", type);
00461     compiler.add(this, "node_gradient_texture");
00462 }

00466 NoiseTextureNode::NoiseTextureNode()
00467 : TextureNode("noise_texture")
00468 {
00469     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT, ShaderInput::TEXTURE_GENERATED);
00470     add_input("Scale", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00471     add_input("Detail", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 2.0f);
00472     add_input("Distortion", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 0.0f);
00473 
00474     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00475     add_output("Fac", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00476 }
00477 
00478 void NoiseTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00479 {
00480     ShaderInput *distortion_in = input("Distortion");
00481     ShaderInput *detail_in = input("Detail");
00482     ShaderInput *scale_in = input("Scale");
00483     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00484     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00485     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00486 
00487     if(vector_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00488     if(scale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(scale_in);
00489     if(detail_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(detail_in);
00490     if(distortion_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(distortion_in);
00491 
00492     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00493 
00494     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00495         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00496         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00497     }
00498 
00499     if(!fac_out->links.empty())
00500         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00501     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00502         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00503 
00504     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_NOISE,
00505         compiler.encode_uchar4(vector_offset, scale_in->stack_offset, detail_in->stack_offset, distortion_in->stack_offset),
00506         compiler.encode_uchar4(color_out->stack_offset, fac_out->stack_offset));
00507     compiler.add_node(
00508         __float_as_int(scale_in->value.x),
00509         __float_as_int(detail_in->value.x),
00510         __float_as_int(distortion_in->value.x));
00511 
00512     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00513         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00514 }

00517 {
00518     compiler.add(this, "node_noise_texture");
00519 }

00535 VoronoiTextureNode::VoronoiTextureNode()

00547 void VoronoiTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00548 {
00549     ShaderInput *scale_in = input("Scale");
00550     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00551     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00552     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00553 
00554     if(vector_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00555     if(scale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(scale_in);
00556 
00557     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00558 
00559     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00560         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00561         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00562     }
00563 
00564     compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00565     compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00566 
00567     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_VORONOI,
00568         coloring_enum[coloring],
00569         compiler.encode_uchar4(scale_in->stack_offset, vector_offset, fac_out->stack_offset, color_out->stack_offset),
00570         __float_as_int(scale_in->value.x));
00571 
00572     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00573         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00574 }

00582 /* Musgrave Texture */
00583 
00584 static ShaderEnum musgrave_type_init()
00585 {
00586     ShaderEnum enm;
00587 
00588     enm.insert("Multifractal", NODE_MUSGRAVE_MULTIFRACTAL);
00589     enm.insert("fBM", NODE_MUSGRAVE_FBM);
00590     enm.insert("Hybrid Multifractal", NODE_MUSGRAVE_HYBRID_MULTIFRACTAL);
00591     enm.insert("Ridged Multifractal", NODE_MUSGRAVE_RIDGED_MULTIFRACTAL);
00592     enm.insert("Hetero Terrain", NODE_MUSGRAVE_HETERO_TERRAIN);
00593 
00594     return enm;
00595 }
00596 
00597 ShaderEnum MusgraveTextureNode::type_enum = musgrave_type_init();
00598 
00599 MusgraveTextureNode::MusgraveTextureNode()
00600 : TextureNode("musgrave_texture")
00601 {
00602     type = ustring("fBM");
00603 
00604     add_input("Scale", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00605     add_input("Detail", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 2.0f);
00606     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT, ShaderInput::TEXTURE_GENERATED);
00607     add_input("Dimension", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 2.0f);
00608     add_input("Lacunarity", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00609     add_input("Offset", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 0.0f);
00610     add_input("Gain", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00611 
00612     add_output("Fac", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00613     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00614 }
00615 
00616 void MusgraveTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00617 {
00618     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00619     ShaderInput *scale_in = input("Scale");
00620     ShaderInput *dimension_in = input("Dimension");
00621     ShaderInput *lacunarity_in = input("Lacunarity");
00622     ShaderInput *detail_in = input("Detail");
00623     ShaderInput *offset_in = input("Offset");
00624     ShaderInput *gain_in = input("Gain");
00625     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00626     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00627 
00628     if(vector_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00629     if(dimension_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(dimension_in);
00630     if(lacunarity_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(lacunarity_in);
00631     if(detail_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(detail_in);
00632     if(offset_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(offset_in);
00633     if(gain_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(gain_in);
00634     if(scale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(scale_in);
00635 
00636     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00637 
00638     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00639         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00640         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00641     }
00642 
00643     if(!fac_out->links.empty())
00644         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00645     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00646         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00647 
00648     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_MUSGRAVE,
00649         compiler.encode_uchar4(type_enum[type], vector_offset, color_out->stack_offset, fac_out->stack_offset),
00650         compiler.encode_uchar4(dimension_in->stack_offset, lacunarity_in->stack_offset, detail_in->stack_offset, offset_in->stack_offset),
00651         compiler.encode_uchar4(gain_in->stack_offset, scale_in->stack_offset));
00652     compiler.add_node(__float_as_int(dimension_in->value.x),
00653         __float_as_int(lacunarity_in->value.x),
00654         __float_as_int(detail_in->value.x),
00655         __float_as_int(offset_in->value.x));
00656     compiler.add_node(__float_as_int(gain_in->value.x),
00657         __float_as_int(scale_in->value.x));
00658 
00659     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00660         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00661 }
00662 
00663 void MusgraveTextureNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00664 {
00665     compiler.parameter("Type", type);
00666 
00667     compiler.add(this, "node_musgrave_texture");
00668 }

00675

00682 ShaderEnum WaveTextureNode::type_enum = wave_type_init();
00683 
00684 WaveTextureNode::WaveTextureNode()
00685 : TextureNode("marble_texture")
00686 {
00687     type = ustring("Bands");
00688 
00689     add_input("Scale", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00690     add_input("Distortion", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 0.0f);
00691     add_input("Detail", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 2.0f);
00692     add_input("Detail Scale", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00693     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT, ShaderInput::TEXTURE_GENERATED);
00694 
00695     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00696     add_output("Fac", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00697 }
00698 
00699 void WaveTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00700 {
00701     ShaderInput *scale_in = input("Scale");
00702     ShaderInput *distortion_in = input("Distortion");
00703     ShaderInput *dscale_in = input("Detail Scale");
00704     ShaderInput *detail_in = input("Detail");
00705     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00706     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00707     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00708 
00709     if(scale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(scale_in);
00710     if(detail_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(detail_in);
00711     if(distortion_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(distortion_in);
00712     if(dscale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(dscale_in);
00713     if(vector_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00714 
00715     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00716 
00717     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00718         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00719         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00720     }
00721 
00722     if(!fac_out->links.empty())
00723         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00724     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00725         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00726 
00727     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_WAVE,
00728         compiler.encode_uchar4(type_enum[type], color_out->stack_offset, fac_out->stack_offset, dscale_in->stack_offset),
00729         compiler.encode_uchar4(vector_offset, scale_in->stack_offset, detail_in->stack_offset, distortion_in->stack_offset));
00730 
00731     compiler.add_node(
00732         __float_as_int(scale_in->value.x),
00733         __float_as_int(detail_in->value.x),
00734         __float_as_int(distortion_in->value.x),
00735         __float_as_int(dscale_in->value.x));
00736 
00737     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00738         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00739 }
00740 
00741 void WaveTextureNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00742 {
00743     compiler.parameter("Type", type);
00744 
00745     compiler.add(this, "node_marble_texture");
00746 }

00748 /* Magic Texture */
00749 
00750 MagicTextureNode::MagicTextureNode()
00751 : TextureNode("magic_texture")
00752 {
00753     depth = 2;
00754 
00755     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT, ShaderInput::TEXTURE_GENERATED);
00756     add_input("Scale", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 5.0f);
00757     add_input("Distortion", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00758 
00759     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00760     add_output("Fac", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00761 }
00762 
00763 void MagicTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00764 {
00765     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00766     ShaderInput *scale_in = input("Scale");
00767     ShaderInput *distortion_in = input("Distortion");
00768     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00769     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00770 
00771     if(vector_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00772     if(distortion_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(distortion_in);
00773     if(scale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(scale_in);
00774 
00775     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00776 
00777     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00778         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00779         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00780     }
00781 
00782     if(!fac_out->links.empty())
00783         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00784     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00785         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00786 
00787     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_MAGIC,
00788         compiler.encode_uchar4(depth, color_out->stack_offset, fac_out->stack_offset),
00789         compiler.encode_uchar4(vector_offset, scale_in->stack_offset, distortion_in->stack_offset));
00790     compiler.add_node(
00791         __float_as_int(scale_in->value.x),
00792         __float_as_int(distortion_in->value.x));
00793 
00794     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00795         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00796 }
00797 
00798 void MagicTextureNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00799 {
00800     compiler.parameter("Depth", depth);
00801     compiler.add(this, "node_magic_texture");
00802 }

00804 /* Checker Texture */
00805 
00806 CheckerTextureNode::CheckerTextureNode()
00807 : TextureNode("checker_texture")
00808 {
00809     add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT, ShaderInput::TEXTURE_GENERATED);
00810     add_input("Color1", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00811     add_input("Color2", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00812     add_input("Scale", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
00813 
00814     add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00815     add_output("Fac", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00816 }
00817 
00818 void CheckerTextureNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00819 {
00820     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00821     ShaderInput *color1_in = input("Color1");
00822     ShaderInput *color2_in = input("Color2");
00823     ShaderInput *scale_in = input("Scale");
00824     
00825     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
00826     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
00827 
00828     compiler.stack_assign(vector_in);
00829     compiler.stack_assign(color1_in);
00830     compiler.stack_assign(color2_in);
00831     if(scale_in->link) compiler.stack_assign(scale_in);
00832 
00833     int vector_offset = vector_in->stack_offset;
00834 
00835     if(!tex_mapping.skip()) {
00836         vector_offset = compiler.stack_find_offset(SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00837         tex_mapping.compile(compiler, vector_in->stack_offset, vector_offset);
00838     }
00839 
00840     if(!color_out->links.empty())
00841         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
00842     if(!fac_out->links.empty())
00843         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
00844 
00845     compiler.add_node(NODE_TEX_CHECKER,
00846         compiler.encode_uchar4(vector_offset, color1_in->stack_offset, color2_in->stack_offset, scale_in->stack_offset),
00847         compiler.encode_uchar4(color_out->stack_offset, fac_out->stack_offset),
00848         __float_as_int(scale_in->value.x));
00849 
00850     if(vector_offset != vector_in->stack_offset)
00851         compiler.stack_clear_offset(vector_in->type, vector_offset);
00852 }
00853 
00854 void CheckerTextureNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00855 {
00856     compiler.add(this, "node_checker_texture");
00857 }

00861 NormalNode::NormalNode()
00862 : ShaderNode("normal")
00863 {
00864     direction = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00865 
00866     add_input("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
00867     add_output("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
00868     add_output("Dot",  SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00869 }
00870 
00871 void NormalNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00872 {
00873     ShaderInput *normal_in = input("Normal");
00874     ShaderOutput *normal_out = output("Normal");
00875     ShaderOutput *dot_out = output("Dot");
00876 
00877     compiler.stack_assign(normal_in);
00878     compiler.stack_assign(normal_out);
00879     compiler.stack_assign(dot_out);
00880 
00881     compiler.add_node(NODE_NORMAL, normal_in->stack_offset, normal_out->stack_offset, dot_out->stack_offset);
00882     compiler.add_node(
00883         __float_as_int(direction.x),
00884         __float_as_int(direction.y),
00885         __float_as_int(direction.z));
00886 }

00901 }

00904 {
00905     ShaderInput *vector_in = input("Vector");
00906     ShaderOutput *vector_out = output("Vector");
00907

00909     compiler.stack_assign(vector_out);
00910

00914 void MappingNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
00915 {
00916     Transform tfm = transform_transpose(tex_mapping.compute_transform());
00917     compiler.parameter("Matrix", tfm);
00918 
00919     compiler.add(this, "node_mapping");
00920 }
00921 
00922 /* Convert */
00923 
00924 ConvertNode::ConvertNode(ShaderSocketType from_, ShaderSocketType to_)
00925 : ShaderNode("convert")
00926 {
00927     from = from_;
00928     to = to_;
00929 
00930     assert(from != to);
00931 
00932     if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT)
00933         add_input("Val", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00934     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR)
00935         add_input("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00936     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR)
00937         add_input("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00938     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_POINT)
00939         add_input("Point", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
00940     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL)
00941         add_input("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
00942     else
00943         assert(0);
00944 
00945     if(to == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT)
00946         add_output("Val", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
00947     else if(to == SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR)
00948         add_output("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
00949     else if(to == SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR)
00950         add_output("Vector", SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
00951     else if(to == SHADER_SOCKET_POINT)
00952         add_output("Point", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
00953     else if(to == SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL)
00954         add_output("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
00955     else
00956         assert(0);
00957 }
00958 
00959 void ConvertNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
00960 {
00961     ShaderInput *in = inputs[0];
00962     ShaderOutput *out = outputs[0];
00963 
00964     if(to == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT) {
00965         compiler.stack_assign(in);
00966         compiler.stack_assign(out);
00967 
00968         if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR)
00969             /* color to float */
00970             compiler.add_node(NODE_CONVERT, NODE_CONVERT_CF, in->stack_offset, out->stack_offset);
00971         else
00972             /* vector/point/normal to float */
00973             compiler.add_node(NODE_CONVERT, NODE_CONVERT_VF, in->stack_offset, out->stack_offset);
00974     }
00975     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT) {
00976         compiler.stack_assign(in);
00977         compiler.stack_assign(out);
00978 
00979         /* float to float3 */
00980         compiler.add_node(NODE_CONVERT, NODE_CONVERT_FV, in->stack_offset, out->stack_offset);
00981     }
00982     else {
00983         /* float3 to float3 */
00984         if(in->link) {
00985             /* no op in SVM */
00986             compiler.stack_link(in, out);
00987         }
00988         else {
00989             /* set 0,0,0 value */
00990             compiler.stack_assign(in);
00991             compiler.stack_assign(out);
00992 
00993             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, in->stack_offset);
00994             compiler.add_node(NODE_VALUE_V, in->value);
00995         }
00996     }
00997 }
00998 
00999 void ConvertNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01000 {
01001     if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT)
01002         compiler.add(this, "node_convert_from_float");
01003     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR)
01004         compiler.add(this, "node_convert_from_color");
01005     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR)
01006         compiler.add(this, "node_convert_from_vector");
01007     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_POINT)
01008         compiler.add(this, "node_convert_from_point");
01009     else if(from == SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL)
01010         compiler.add(this, "node_convert_from_normal");
01011     else
01012         assert(0);
01013 }
01014

01024     add_output("Output", to);
01025 }

01032 {
01033 }
01034 
01035 /* BSDF Closure */
01036 
01037 BsdfNode::BsdfNode()
01038 : ShaderNode("bsdf")
01039 {
01040     closure = ccl::CLOSURE_BSDF_DIFFUSE_ID;
01041 
01042     add_input("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR, make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f));
01043     add_input("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL, ShaderInput::NORMAL, true);
01044 
01045     add_output("BSDF", SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE);
01046 }
01047 
01048 void BsdfNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler, ShaderInput *param1, ShaderInput *param2)
01049 {
01050     ShaderInput *color_in = input("Color");
01051 
01052     if(color_in->link) {
01053         compiler.stack_assign(color_in);
01054         compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_WEIGHT, color_in->stack_offset);
01055     }
01056     else
01057         compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_SET_WEIGHT, color_in->value);
01058     
01059     if(param1)
01060         compiler.stack_assign(param1);
01061     if(param2)
01062         compiler.stack_assign(param2);
01063 
01064     compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_BSDF,
01065         compiler.encode_uchar4(closure,
01066             (param1)? param1->stack_offset: SVM_STACK_INVALID,
01067             (param2)? param2->stack_offset: SVM_STACK_INVALID,
01068             compiler.closure_mix_weight_offset()),
01069         __float_as_int((param1)? param1->value.x: 0.0f),
01070         __float_as_int((param2)? param2->value.x: 0.0f));
01071 }
01072 
01073 void BsdfNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01074 {
01075     compile(compiler, NULL, NULL);
01076 }
01077 
01078 void BsdfNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01079 {
01080     assert(0);
01081 }
01082

01126 {
01127     closure = (ClosureType)distribution_enum[distribution];
01128 
01129     if(closure == CLOSURE_BSDF_REFLECTION_ID)
01130         BsdfNode::compile(compiler, NULL, NULL);
01131     else
01132         BsdfNode::compile(compiler, input("Roughness"), NULL);
01133 }

01187 }
01188 
01189 void VelvetBsdfNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01190 {
01191     BsdfNode::compile(compiler, input("Sigma"), NULL);
01192 }
01193 
01194 void VelvetBsdfNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)

01196     compiler.add(this, "node_velvet_bsdf");
01197 }

01251 
01252 /* Emissive Closure */
01253 
01254 EmissionNode::EmissionNode()
01255 : ShaderNode("emission")
01256 {
01257     total_power = false;
01258 
01259     add_input("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR, make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f));
01260     add_input("Strength", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 10.0f);
01261     add_output("Emission", SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE);
01262 }
01263 
01264 void EmissionNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01265 {
01266     ShaderInput *color_in = input("Color");
01267     ShaderInput *strength_in = input("Strength");
01268 
01269     if(color_in->link || strength_in->link) {
01270         compiler.stack_assign(color_in);
01271         compiler.stack_assign(strength_in);
01272         compiler.add_node(NODE_EMISSION_WEIGHT, color_in->stack_offset, strength_in->stack_offset, total_power? 1: 0);
01273     }
01274     else if(total_power)
01275         compiler.add_node(NODE_EMISSION_SET_WEIGHT_TOTAL, color_in->value * strength_in->value.x);
01276     else
01277         compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_SET_WEIGHT, color_in->value * strength_in->value.x);
01278 
01279     compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_EMISSION, compiler.closure_mix_weight_offset());
01280 }
01281 
01282 void EmissionNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01283 {
01284     compiler.parameter("TotalPower", (total_power)? 1: 0);
01285     compiler.add(this, "node_emission");
01286 }
01287 
01288 /* Background Closure */
01289 
01290 BackgroundNode::BackgroundNode()
01291 : ShaderNode("background")
01292 {
01293     add_input("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR, make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f));
01294     add_input("Strength", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
01295     add_output("Background", SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE);
01296 }
01297 
01298 void BackgroundNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01299 {
01300     ShaderInput *color_in = input("Color");
01301     ShaderInput *strength_in = input("Strength");
01302 
01303     if(color_in->link || strength_in->link) {
01304         compiler.stack_assign(color_in);
01305         compiler.stack_assign(strength_in);
01306         compiler.add_node(NODE_EMISSION_WEIGHT, color_in->stack_offset, strength_in->stack_offset);
01307     }
01308     else
01309         compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_SET_WEIGHT, color_in->value*strength_in->value.x);
01310 
01311     compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_BACKGROUND, compiler.closure_mix_weight_offset());
01312 }
01313 
01314 void BackgroundNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01315 {
01316     compiler.add(this, "node_background");
01317 }

01337 /* Volume Closure */
01338 
01339 VolumeNode::VolumeNode()
01340 : ShaderNode("volume")
01341 {
01342     closure = ccl::CLOSURE_VOLUME_ISOTROPIC_ID;
01343 
01344     add_input("Color", SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR, make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f));
01345     add_input("Density", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 1.0f);
01346 
01347     add_output("Volume", SHADER_SOCKET_CLOSURE);
01348 }
01349 
01350 void VolumeNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler, ShaderInput *param1, ShaderInput *param2)
01351 {
01352     ShaderInput *color_in = input("Color");
01353 
01354     if(color_in->link) {
01355         compiler.stack_assign(color_in);
01356         compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_WEIGHT, color_in->stack_offset);
01357     }
01358     else
01359         compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_SET_WEIGHT, color_in->value);
01360     
01361     if(param1)
01362         compiler.stack_assign(param1);
01363     if(param2)
01364         compiler.stack_assign(param2);
01365 
01366     compiler.add_node(NODE_CLOSURE_VOLUME,
01367         compiler.encode_uchar4(closure,
01368             (param1)? param1->stack_offset: SVM_STACK_INVALID,
01369             (param2)? param2->stack_offset: SVM_STACK_INVALID,
01370             compiler.closure_mix_weight_offset()),
01371         __float_as_int((param1)? param1->value.x: 0.0f),
01372         __float_as_int((param2)? param2->value.x: 0.0f));
01373 }
01374 
01375 void VolumeNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01376 {
01377     compile(compiler, NULL, NULL);
01378 }
01379 
01380 void VolumeNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01381 {
01382     assert(0);
01383 }

01418 
01419 /* Geometry */
01420 
01421 GeometryNode::GeometryNode()
01422 : ShaderNode("geometry")
01423 {
01424     add_input("NormalIn", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL, ShaderInput::NORMAL, true);
01425     add_output("Position", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01426     add_output("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
01427     add_output("Tangent", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
01428     add_output("True Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
01429     add_output("Incoming", SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
01430     add_output("Parametric", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01431     add_output("Backfacing", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01432 }
01433 
01434 void GeometryNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01435 {
01436     ShaderOutput *out;
01437     NodeType geom_node = NODE_GEOMETRY;
01438 
01439     if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DX)
01440         geom_node = NODE_GEOMETRY_BUMP_DX;
01441     else if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DY)
01442         geom_node = NODE_GEOMETRY_BUMP_DY;
01443     
01444     out = output("Position");
01445     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01446         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01447         compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_P, out->stack_offset);
01448     }
01449 
01450     out = output("Normal");
01451     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01452         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01453         compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_N, out->stack_offset);
01454     }
01455 
01456     out = output("Tangent");
01457     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01458         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01459         compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_T, out->stack_offset);
01460     }
01461 
01462     out = output("True Normal");
01463     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01464         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01465         compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_Ng, out->stack_offset);
01466     }
01467 
01468     out = output("Incoming");
01469     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01470         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01471         compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_I, out->stack_offset);
01472     }
01473 
01474     out = output("Parametric");
01475     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01476         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01477         compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_uv, out->stack_offset);
01478     }
01479 
01480     out = output("Backfacing");
01481     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01482         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01483         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_backfacing, out->stack_offset);
01484     }
01485 }
01486 
01487 void GeometryNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01488 {
01489     if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DX)
01490         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "dx");
01491     else if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DY)
01492         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "dy");
01493     else
01494         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "center");
01495 
01496     compiler.add(this, "node_geometry");
01497 }
01498 
01499 /* TextureCoordinate */
01500 
01501 TextureCoordinateNode::TextureCoordinateNode()
01502 : ShaderNode("texture_coordinate")
01503 {
01504     add_input("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL, ShaderInput::NORMAL, true);
01505     add_output("Generated", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01506     add_output("UV", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01507     add_output("Object", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01508     add_output("Camera", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01509     add_output("Window", SHADER_SOCKET_POINT);
01510     add_output("Reflection", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL);
01511 }
01512 
01513 void TextureCoordinateNode::attributes(AttributeRequestSet *attributes)
01514 {
01515     if(!output("Generated")->links.empty())
01516         attributes->add(Attribute::STD_GENERATED);
01517     if(!output("UV")->links.empty())
01518         attributes->add(Attribute::STD_UV);
01519 
01520     ShaderNode::attributes(attributes);
01521 }
01522 
01523 void TextureCoordinateNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01524 {
01525     ShaderOutput *out;
01526     NodeType texco_node = NODE_TEX_COORD;
01527     NodeType attr_node = NODE_ATTR;
01528     NodeType geom_node = NODE_GEOMETRY;
01529 
01530     if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DX) {
01531         texco_node = NODE_TEX_COORD_BUMP_DX;
01532         attr_node = NODE_ATTR_BUMP_DX;
01533         geom_node = NODE_GEOMETRY_BUMP_DX;
01534     }
01535     else if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DY) {
01536         texco_node = NODE_TEX_COORD_BUMP_DY;
01537         attr_node = NODE_ATTR_BUMP_DY;
01538         geom_node = NODE_GEOMETRY_BUMP_DY;
01539     }
01540     
01541     out = output("Generated");
01542     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01543         if(compiler.background) {
01544             compiler.stack_assign(out);
01545             compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_P, out->stack_offset);
01546         }
01547         else {
01548             int attr = compiler.attribute(Attribute::STD_GENERATED);
01549             compiler.stack_assign(out);
01550             compiler.add_node(attr_node, attr, out->stack_offset, NODE_ATTR_FLOAT3);
01551         }
01552     }
01553 
01554     out = output("UV");
01555     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01556         int attr = compiler.attribute(Attribute::STD_UV);
01557         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01558         compiler.add_node(attr_node, attr, out->stack_offset, NODE_ATTR_FLOAT3);
01559     }
01560 
01561     out = output("Object");
01562     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01563         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01564         compiler.add_node(texco_node, NODE_TEXCO_OBJECT, out->stack_offset);
01565     }
01566 
01567     out = output("Camera");
01568     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01569         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01570         compiler.add_node(texco_node, NODE_TEXCO_CAMERA, out->stack_offset);
01571     }
01572 
01573     out = output("Window");
01574     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01575         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01576         compiler.add_node(texco_node, NODE_TEXCO_WINDOW, out->stack_offset);
01577     }
01578 
01579     out = output("Reflection");
01580     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01581         if(compiler.background) {
01582             compiler.stack_assign(out);
01583             compiler.add_node(geom_node, NODE_GEOM_I, out->stack_offset);
01584         }
01585         else {
01586             compiler.stack_assign(out);
01587             compiler.add_node(texco_node, NODE_TEXCO_REFLECTION, out->stack_offset);
01588         }
01589     }
01590 }
01591 
01592 void TextureCoordinateNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01593 {
01594     if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DX)
01595         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "dx");
01596     else if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DY)
01597         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "dy");
01598     else
01599         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "center");
01600     
01601     if(compiler.background)
01602         compiler.parameter("is_background", true);
01603 
01604     compiler.add(this, "node_texture_coordinate");
01605 }

01607 /* Light Path */
01608 
01609 LightPathNode::LightPathNode()
01610 : ShaderNode("light_path")
01611 {
01612     add_output("Is Camera Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01613     add_output("Is Shadow Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01614     add_output("Is Diffuse Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01615     add_output("Is Glossy Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01616     add_output("Is Singular Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01617     add_output("Is Reflection Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01618     add_output("Is Transmission Ray", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
01619 }
01620 
01621 void LightPathNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01622 {
01623     ShaderOutput *out;
01624 
01625     out = output("Is Camera Ray");
01626     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01627         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01628         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_camera, out->stack_offset);
01629     }
01630 
01631     out = output("Is Shadow Ray");
01632     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01633         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01634         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_shadow, out->stack_offset);
01635     }
01636 
01637     out = output("Is Diffuse Ray");
01638     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01639         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01640         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_diffuse, out->stack_offset);
01641     }
01642 
01643     out = output("Is Glossy Ray");
01644     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01645         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01646         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_glossy, out->stack_offset);
01647     }
01648 
01649     out = output("Is Singular Ray");
01650     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01651         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01652         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_singular, out->stack_offset);
01653     }
01654 
01655     out = output("Is Reflection Ray");
01656     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01657         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01658         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_reflection, out->stack_offset);
01659     }
01660 
01661 
01662     out = output("Is Transmission Ray");
01663     if(!out->links.empty()) {
01664         compiler.stack_assign(out);
01665         compiler.add_node(NODE_LIGHT_PATH, NODE_LP_transmission, out->stack_offset);
01666     }
01667 }
01668 
01669 void LightPathNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01670 {
01671     compiler.add(this, "node_light_path");
01672 }

01777 void InvertNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01778 {
01779     ShaderInput *fac_in = input("Fac");
01780     ShaderInput *color_in = input("Color");
01781     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
01782 
01783     compiler.stack_assign(fac_in);
01784     compiler.stack_assign(color_in);
01785     compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
01786 
01787     compiler.add_node(NODE_INVERT, fac_in->stack_offset, color_in->stack_offset, color_out->stack_offset);
01788 }

01798 : ShaderNode("mix")

01800     type = ustring("Mix");
01801

01807 
01808 static ShaderEnum mix_type_init()
01809 {
01810     ShaderEnum enm;
01811 
01812     enm.insert("Mix", NODE_MIX_BLEND);
01813     enm.insert("Add", NODE_MIX_ADD);
01814     enm.insert("Multiply", NODE_MIX_MUL);
01815     enm.insert("Screen", NODE_MIX_SCREEN);
01816     enm.insert("Overlay", NODE_MIX_OVERLAY);
01817     enm.insert("Subtract", NODE_MIX_SUB);
01818     enm.insert("Divide", NODE_MIX_DIV);
01819     enm.insert("Difference", NODE_MIX_DIFF);
01820     enm.insert("Darken", NODE_MIX_DARK);
01821     enm.insert("Lighten", NODE_MIX_LIGHT);
01822     enm.insert("Dodge", NODE_MIX_DODGE);
01823     enm.insert("Burn", NODE_MIX_BURN);
01824     enm.insert("Hue", NODE_MIX_HUE);
01825     enm.insert("Saturation", NODE_MIX_SAT);
01826     enm.insert("Value", NODE_MIX_VAL );
01827     enm.insert("Color", NODE_MIX_COLOR);
01828     enm.insert("Soft Light", NODE_MIX_SOFT);
01829     enm.insert("Linear Light", NODE_MIX_LINEAR);
01830 
01831     return enm;
01832 }
01833 
01834 ShaderEnum MixNode::type_enum = mix_type_init();
01835 
01836 void MixNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
01837 {
01838     ShaderInput *fac_in = input("Fac");
01839     ShaderInput *color1_in = input("Color1");
01840     ShaderInput *color2_in = input("Color2");
01841     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
01842 
01843     compiler.stack_assign(fac_in);
01844     compiler.stack_assign(color1_in);
01845     compiler.stack_assign(color2_in);
01846     compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
01847 
01848     compiler.add_node(NODE_MIX, fac_in->stack_offset, color1_in->stack_offset, color2_in->stack_offset);
01849     compiler.add_node(NODE_MIX, type_enum[type], color_out->stack_offset);
01850 }
01851 
01852 void MixNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
01853 {
01854     compiler.parameter("type", type);
01855     compiler.add(this, "node_mix");
01856 }

01997 void HSVNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)

02014     compiler.add_node(NODE_HSV, hue_in->stack_offset, saturation_in->stack_offset, value_in->stack_offset);

02022 /* Attribute */
02023 
02024 AttributeNode::AttributeNode()
02025 : ShaderNode("attribute")
02026 {
02027     attribute = "";
02028 
02029     add_output("Color",  SHADER_SOCKET_COLOR);
02030     add_output("Vector",  SHADER_SOCKET_VECTOR);
02031     add_output("Fac",  SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
02032 }
02033 
02034 void AttributeNode::attributes(AttributeRequestSet *attributes)
02035 {
02036     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
02037     ShaderOutput *vector_out = output("Vector");
02038     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
02039 
02040     if(!color_out->links.empty() || !vector_out->links.empty() || !fac_out->links.empty())
02041         attributes->add(attribute);
02042     
02043     ShaderNode::attributes(attributes);
02044 }
02045 
02046 void AttributeNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
02047 {
02048     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
02049     ShaderOutput *vector_out = output("Vector");
02050     ShaderOutput *fac_out = output("Fac");
02051     NodeType attr_node = NODE_ATTR;
02052 
02053     if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DX)
02054         attr_node = NODE_ATTR_BUMP_DX;
02055     else if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DY)
02056         attr_node = NODE_ATTR_BUMP_DY;
02057 
02058     if(!color_out->links.empty() || !vector_out->links.empty()) {
02059         int attr = compiler.attribute(attribute);
02060 
02061         if(!color_out->links.empty()) {
02062             compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
02063             compiler.add_node(attr_node, attr, color_out->stack_offset, NODE_ATTR_FLOAT3);
02064         }
02065         if(!vector_out->links.empty()) {
02066             compiler.stack_assign(vector_out);
02067             compiler.add_node(attr_node, attr, vector_out->stack_offset, NODE_ATTR_FLOAT3);
02068         }
02069     }
02070 
02071     if(!fac_out->links.empty()) {
02072         int attr = compiler.attribute(attribute);
02073 
02074         compiler.stack_assign(fac_out);
02075         compiler.add_node(attr_node, attr, fac_out->stack_offset, NODE_ATTR_FLOAT);
02076     }
02077 }
02078 
02079 void AttributeNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
02080 {
02081     if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DX)
02082         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "dx");
02083     else if(bump == SHADER_BUMP_DY)
02084         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "dy");
02085     else
02086         compiler.parameter("bump_offset", "center");
02087 
02088     compiler.parameter("name", attribute.c_str());
02089     compiler.add(this, "node_attribute");
02090 }

02144 /* Blend Weight */
02145 
02146 LayerWeightNode::LayerWeightNode()
02147 : ShaderNode("LayerWeight")
02148 {
02149     add_input("Normal", SHADER_SOCKET_NORMAL, ShaderInput::NORMAL, true);
02150     add_input("Blend", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT, 0.5f);
02151 
02152     add_output("Fresnel", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
02153     add_output("Facing", SHADER_SOCKET_FLOAT);
02154 }
02155 
02156 void LayerWeightNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
02157 {
02158     ShaderInput *blend_in = input("Blend");
02159 
02160     if(blend_in->link)
02161         compiler.stack_assign(blend_in);
02162 
02163     ShaderOutput *fresnel_out = output("Fresnel");
02164     if(!fresnel_out->links.empty()) {
02165         compiler.stack_assign(fresnel_out);
02166         compiler.add_node(NODE_LAYER_WEIGHT, blend_in->stack_offset, __float_as_int(blend_in->value.x),
02167             compiler.encode_uchar4(NODE_LAYER_WEIGHT_FRESNEL, fresnel_out->stack_offset));
02168     }
02169 
02170     ShaderOutput *facing_out = output("Facing");
02171     if(!facing_out->links.empty()) {
02172         compiler.stack_assign(facing_out);
02173         compiler.add_node(NODE_LAYER_WEIGHT, blend_in->stack_offset, __float_as_int(blend_in->value.x),
02174             compiler.encode_uchar4(NODE_LAYER_WEIGHT_FACING, facing_out->stack_offset));
02175     }
02176 }
02177 
02178 void LayerWeightNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
02179 {
02180     compiler.add(this, "node_layer_height");
02181 }

02193 void OutputNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
02194 {
02195     if(compiler.output_type() == SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT) {
02196         ShaderInput *displacement_in = input("Displacement");
02197 
02198         if(displacement_in->link) {
02199             compiler.stack_assign(displacement_in);
02200             compiler.add_node(NODE_SET_DISPLACEMENT, displacement_in->stack_offset);
02201         }
02202     }
02203 }
02204 
02205 void OutputNode::compile(OSLCompiler& compiler)
02206 {
02207     if(compiler.output_type() == SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE)
02208         compiler.add(this, "node_output_surface");
02209     else if(compiler.output_type() == SHADER_TYPE_VOLUME)
02210         compiler.add(this, "node_output_volume");
02211     else if(compiler.output_type() == SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT)
02212         compiler.add(this, "node_output_displacement");
02213 }

02232     enm.insert("Subtract", NODE_MATH_SUBTRACT);
02233     enm.insert("Multiply", NODE_MATH_MULTIPLY);
02234     enm.insert("Divide", NODE_MATH_DIVIDE);
02235     enm.insert("Sine", NODE_MATH_SINE);
02236     enm.insert("Cosine", NODE_MATH_COSINE);
02237     enm.insert("Tangent", NODE_MATH_TANGENT);
02238     enm.insert("Arcsine", NODE_MATH_ARCSINE);
02239     enm.insert("Arccosine", NODE_MATH_ARCCOSINE);
02240     enm.insert("Arctangent", NODE_MATH_ARCTANGENT);
02241     enm.insert("Power", NODE_MATH_POWER);
02242     enm.insert("Logarithm", NODE_MATH_LOGARITHM);
02243     enm.insert("Minimum", NODE_MATH_MINIMUM);
02244     enm.insert("Maximum", NODE_MATH_MAXIMUM);
02245     enm.insert("Round", NODE_MATH_ROUND);
02246     enm.insert("Less Than", NODE_MATH_LESS_THAN);
02247     enm.insert("Greater Than", NODE_MATH_GREATER_THAN);
02248 
02249     return enm;
02250 }

02393 
02394 void RGBRampNode::compile(SVMCompiler& compiler)
02395 {
02396     ShaderInput *fac_in = input("Fac");
02397     ShaderOutput *color_out = output("Color");
02398     ShaderOutput *alpha_out = output("Alpha");
02399 
02400     compiler.stack_assign(fac_in);
02401     if(!color_out->links.empty())
02402         compiler.stack_assign(color_out);
02403     if(!alpha_out->links.empty())
02404         compiler.stack_assign(alpha_out);
02405 
02406     compiler.add_node(NODE_RGB_RAMP, fac_in->stack_offset, color_out->stack_offset, alpha_out->stack_offset);
02407     compiler.add_array(ramp, RAMP_TABLE_SIZE);
02408 }
